title.rendered: CFC Goodwill Ambassador Anushi Gundecha celebrates Diwali with children from Smile Foundation

content.rendered:
Anushi Gundecha, a goodwill ambassador for Smile Foundation’s Child for Child programme recently spend a fun filled day with children from a Mission Education centre in Mumbai. She celebrated Diwali with the children by making diyas and they also made colorful cards together. She was accompanied by her friends and family.

Anushi has pledged to promote the cause of education for less privileged children in India with the support of other privileged kids. The kids also enjoyed the celebration a lot.

Under Child for Child programme, Smile Foundation visits various schools and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds. It sensitizes children towards various causes and let them realize their privileged status.

Smile Foundation is a national level development organisation directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
